attributes.action: Make DWP and HMRC refer to widowed elderly people as Widowed not single people.
attributes.background: My 84 yr old father was married to my mother for 64 years, she recently died and he is bereft. The DWP and HMRC now tell him that he is a single man. This is this deeply distressing to him, invalidates their marriage and is not true, he is a Widower and should be respectfully acknowledged  as such.
